title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 22 April 2014 - XWiki
content:
<OSIMasson> has quit  
05:20 <D-Spair> has joined #xwiki  
08:47 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:50 <tmortagne> has quit  
08:50 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:01 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:07 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:38 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
09:40 <tmortagne> has quit  
09:51 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
10:08 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
10:09 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
10:21 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
10:30 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:30 <vmassol> good morning  
10:31 <cjd> gm  
10:35 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:56 <Denis> vmassol: Have you been in contact with JetBrain for the renewal of the IntelliJ license ?  
11:02 <vmassol> Denis: no, it's going to expire soon?  
11:03 <vmassol> 28 april, indeed  
11:03 <vmassol> too bad, I met them last Friday physically, I could have asked then ;) Going to send an email for renewal now  
11:03 <vmassol> thanks for the heads up  
11:35 <vmassol> Denis:  
11:35 <vmassol> email sent to jetbrains (I've put you in copy)  
12:14 <vmassol> has quit  
12:19 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
13:40 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
13:43 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
13:56 <ClemensR> Denis: seems xwiki-rendering does not compile on jenkins because of some generics voodoo with Macro<?> Do you have any idea why ?  
14:04 <tmortagne> ClemensR: it's not really voodoo actually, setCurrentBlock method simply does not exist  
14:04 <tmortagne> and some code is using it  
14:04 <ClemensR> ah, ok, so likely some git push missing  
14:04 <tmortagne> Denis must hav done a last minute change and forgot to update some code  
14:04 <tmortagne> we were talking about it before  
14:10 <Denis> ClemensR: Fix, sorry a last minute change that have not receive enough attention  
14:11 <ClemensR> ah, cool, so it should work again now  
14:14 <Denis> now it will work again :)  
14:16 <OSIMasson> has quit  
15:12 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
16:00 <OSIMasson> has quit  
16:40 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
16:53 <OSIMasson> has quit  
16:54 <lucaa1> has joined #xwiki  
16:55 <lucaa> has quit  
17:07 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
17:07 <vmassol> tmortagne: btw when you were offline last week I noticed an issue with the DW when trying to uninstall the Blog application  
17:07 <vmassol> not sure if it's related to DW or EM  
17:07 <vmassol> https://www.evernote.com/shard/s119/sh/75f47249-2f57-4bbe-9718-ade58eaeae3d/e7bb7893c70c264a3641c42b31724eb8  
17:08 <vmassol> it asks to remove Main.WebHome and XWiki.XWikiServerXwiki  
17:09 <vmassol> is this known? If not I can report it  
17:09 <tmortagne> vmassol: don't uninstall the blog application  
17:09 <tmortagne> if you uninstall it you will uninstall XE since it's a XE dependency  
17:09 <tmortagne> it was on myxwiki.org ?  
17:09 <vmassol> well users should be able to uninstall the blog app  
17:09 <vmassol> locally  
17:10 <vmassol> on my local XE  
17:10 <tmortagne> well myxwiki.org had this issue  
17:10 <tmortagne> someone uninstalled it and XE it seems  
17:10 <vmassol> ok creating a jira then  
17:10 <tmortagne> we should not make the blog application a XE dependency then but an extension and instead let users install it  
17:17 <tmortagne> vmassol: what this issue has to do with DW ?  
17:17 <tmortagne> you can't uninstall an extension in DW  
17:17 <vmassol> indeed, fixing  
17:59 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
17:59 <woshilapin> has quit
